name: M.A.X. 2: Mechanized Assault & Exploration
description:
Sequel to the highly-acclaimed M.A.X.

A strategy wargame that combines fully customizable assault units with devastatingly real graphics and tactical multi-player action plus simultaneous turn-based play. As a Mission Commander exploring new worlds, your brain is wired directly into a sophisticated command and control center. The mission: to colonize and defend a new world.

M.A.X.2 wins award: Game Artwork displayed at Society of Illustrators 40th Annual Exhibition!

Features:

路 3D Topography - Unique Parallax scrolling for top down or isometric view.

路 Terrain impacts line of sight, movement, and combat.

路 Adaptive AI... Dynamic game engine provides unpredictable opponents and infinite replayability.

路 Multiplayer Action - Compete and form alliances with up to 6 players via LAN, modem, and free Internet matching service.
